Power Guard PG32FSVC 32 inch (81 cm) LED HD-Ready TV PRICE IN INDIA

Power Guard PG32FSVC 32 inch (81 cm) LED HD-Ready TV price in India starts from Rs. 10,499. The lowest price of Power Guard PG32FSVC 32 inch (81 cm) LED HD-Ready TV is Rs. 10,499 at amazon.in. This is 1 GB RAM / 8 GB internal storage base variant of Power Guard PG32FSVC 32 inch (81 cm) LED HD-Ready TV which is available in Black, Gold colour.

Power Guard PG32FSVC 32 inch (81 cm) LED HD-Ready TV Specifications

General
Brand Power Guard
Model PG32FSVC 32 inch (81 cm) LED HD-Ready TV
Warranty 3 Years

Display
Type LED
Size(Diagonal) 32 Inch (81.28 cm, Ideal for 4-8 feet viewing distance)
Resolution HD ready, 1366 x 768 Pixels

Aspect Ratio 16 : 9
Horizontal Viewing Angles 178 Degrees
Vertical Viewing Angles 178 Degrees
Physical Design

Stand Colour Black

Remote
